p: A higher number of mosquito species were found during the rainy season in the urban area (S = 9, 6 for rainy and dry seasons, respectively), and peri-urban area (S = 22, 19 for rainy and dry seasons, respectively), while more mosquito species were captured during the dry season in the rural area (S = 15, 19 for rainy and dry seasons, respectively) ( Figure 6).
